ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to put one training point into it, then it will be as good as you have learnt from your friend :) ... From: Gregory Egan  To:
ygData.messageBody:
You have to put one training point into it, then it will be as good as you
have learnt from your friend :)
-----Original Message-----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 1:32 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Languages


>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>I have a friend who is teaching me Elvish. He spams me with a macro, "you
>are learning the Elvish tongue", and I occasionally get a message saying my
>language skill is improving. But then I noticed that the only language I
>have a skill for, besides common, is Erudian, which is at awful level. Does
>anyone know if you can learn the other languages if they are not listed in
>your skills? Thanks.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>With more than 17 million e-mails exchanged daily...
>http://www.onelist.com
>...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!
>
